about_the_game:
A disgruntled employee is fired from his job, sparking a path of rage and destruction. Lead Alyx through his journey of vengeance, in this pixel-art adventure where you are the bad guy.



  • A narrative driven, single player experience following a journey of chaos, twists and a protagonist willing to unleash evil to get what he wants
  • A unique set of platforming controls, with the ability to glide across almost any wall or ceiling
  • Alyx uses a tendril to latch onto enemies, desk chairs, traffic lights, sewer pipes, doors and countless other objects. Enjoy creative freedom as you find new ways to kill every time you play
  • 10 chapters that lead players across different environments, ranging from a city at sunset to a dark, winding sewer
  • Unlock 'Nightmare chapters', harder, unforgiving variations that will require mastery of mechanics to beat



Alyx is determined to get revenge for losing his job, and you get to choose exactly how he'll get there. But, what will it cost him?

content_descriptors.notes: Pixelated violence to enemies, including blood and gore. Players have general freedom to do as they please to enemies, in a similar fashion to Carrion or People playground.
